description:
• The basics of writing any kind of document within OpenOffice Writer
  • Hours of commentated video footage where we'll go piece by piece learning the software
  • Explore what each tool in the menu does and how to use them effectively
  • Make OpenOffice yours by customizing your workspace and understanding every component
  • We start with the basics and expand outward into all of the major components and dialog windows that you need to know about.
  • Especially made for beginners, students, and office software enthusiasts.
title: Introduction to OpenOffice Writer: Tutorials for Beginners
